<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="text-indent: -.25in; page-break-after: avoid; margin-left: .75in">
<b><font size="2">16.&nbsp; &nbsp;COMMITMENTS
AND CONTINGENCIES</font></b></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in">
<font size="2">The Company leases
certain facilities and equipment under operating leases.&nbsp; Rent expense under
operating leases for the years ended December 31, 2003, 2002 and 2001 aggregated
$6,358,000, $3,966,000 and $5,433,000, respectively.&nbsp; Future minimum lease
payments under these operating leases at December 31, 2003 are as follows:&nbsp; 2004
- -$7,743,000; 2005 -$6,915,000; 2006 -$5,932,000; 2007 -$4,393,000; 2008 -
$3,276,000; and $7,272,000, thereafter.</font></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in">
<font size="2">The Company entered
into certain operating lease agreements, related to acquired operating locations
and facilities, with the former owners of Construction Metals.&nbsp; These operating
leases are considered to be related party in nature.&nbsp; Rental expense associated
with these related party operating leases aggregated approximately $512,000 in
2003.</font></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in">
<font size="2">The Company is a
party to certain claims and legal actions generally incidental to its business.&nbsp;
Management does not believe that the outcome of these actions, which are not
clearly determinable at the present time, would significantly affect the
Company's financial condition or results of operations.</font></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in">
<font size="2">The Company offers
various product warranties to its customers concerning the quality of its
products and services.&nbsp; </font> </p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in">
<font size="2">Based upon the short
duration of warranty periods and favorable historical warranty experience, the
Company determined that a related warranty accrual at December 31, 2003 and 2002
is not required.</font></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="text-indent: -.25in; page-break-after: avoid; margin-left: .75in">

<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid"><b><font size="2">18.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
SUBSEQUENT EVENT (UNAUDITED)</font></b></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in">
<font size="2">In January 2004, the
Company acquired all of the outstanding stock of Renown Specialties Company Ltd
(Renown) for approximately $5,800,000. Renown is located in Thornhill, Ontario
and is a designer, manufacturer and distributor of structural connectors that
are used to join wood to wood, wood to concrete, and wood to masonry.&nbsp; Renown
will be a part of the Company's Building Products segment.&nbsp; The results of
Renown's operations will be consolidated with the Company's results of
operations from the acquisition date for the quarter ending March 31, 2004.</font></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in">
<font size="2">In connection with
the Company's common stock offering, as discussed in Note 11, the Company
granted the underwriters an option to purchase additional shares of common stock
to cover over-allotments.&nbsp; In January 2004, the underwriters exercised a portion
of this option and purchased an additional 214,625 shares of the Company's
common stock at a price of $24.75 per share.&nbsp; Net proceeds to the Company
associated with the purchase of these additional shares aggregated approximately
$5,000,000.</font></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid">

avoid">&nbsp;</p>

<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="line-height:150%;page-break-after:avoid">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="line-height:150%;page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in"><b>
<u><font size="2">Item 9.</font></u><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</font> <u><font size="2">Changes in and Disagreements with
Accountants on Accounting and Financial Disclosure</font></u></b></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="line-height:150%;page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in">
<font size="2">None.</font></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="line-height:150%;page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in"><b>
<u><font size="2">Item 9A.</font></u><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</font> <u><font size="2">Controls and Procedures</font></u></b></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="text-indent: -21.75pt; line-height: 150%; page-break-after: avoid; margin-left: 57.75pt">
<b><font size="2">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Evaluation of Disclosure Control and Procedures</font></b></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in">
<font size="2">The Company
maintains a system of disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Rule
13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934) designed to
provide reasonable assurance as to the reliability of the financial statements
and other disclosures contained in this report.&nbsp; The Company's Chief Executive
Officer and Chairman of the Board, President and Vice President and Chief
Financial Officer evaluated the effectiveness of the Company's disclosure
controls as of the end of the period covered in this report.&nbsp; Based upon that
evaluation, the Company's Chief Executive Officer and Chairman of the Board,
President, and Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, have concluded that
the Company's disclosure controls and procedures were designed and functioning
effectively to provide reasonable assurance that information required to be
disclosed by the Company in the reports that it files or submits under the
Exchange Act is recorded, processed, summarized and reported within the time
periods specified in the Securities and Exchange Commission rules and forms</font></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="text-indent: -21.75pt; page-break-after: avoid; margin-left: 57.75pt">
<b><font size="2">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Change
in Internal Controls</font></b></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in"><b>
<font size="2">&nbsp;</font></b><font size="2">There have been no
changes in the Company's internal control over financial reporting (as defined
by Rule 13a-15(f)) that occurred during the fourth quarter of 2003 that have
materially affected, or are reasonably likely to materially affect the Company's
internal control over financial reporting.</font></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" align="center" style="text-align:center;line-height:
150%;page-break-after:avoid"><b><u><font size="2">PART III</font></u></b></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" align="center" style="text-align:center;line-height:
150%;page-break-after:avoid">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="line-height:150%;page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in"><b>
<u><font size="2">Item 10.</font></u></b><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</font> <b><u><font size="2">Directors and Executive Officers of the
Registrant</font></u></b></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in">
<font size="2">Information
regarding directors and executive officers of the Company, as well as the
required disclosures with respect to the Company's audit committee financial
expert is incorporated herein by reference to the information included in the
Company's definitive proxy statement which will be filed with the Commission
within 120 days after the end of the Company's 2003 fiscal year.</font></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in">
<font size="2">The Company has
adopted a Code of Ethics that applies to the Chief Executive Officer and
Chairman of the Board, President, Chief Financial Officer and other senior
financial officers and executives of the Company.&nbsp; A complete text of this Code
of Ethics is attached as Exhibit 14 in this Annual Report on Form 10-K. </font> </p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="line-height:150%;page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in"><b>
<u><font size="2">Item 11.</font></u><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</font> <u><font size="2">Executive Compensation</font></u></b></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in">
<font size="2">Information
regarding executive compensation is incorporated herein by reference to the
information included in the Company's definitive proxy statement which will be
filed with the Commission within 120 days after the end of the Company's 2003
fiscal year.</font></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="line-height:150%;page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in"><b>
<u><font size="2">Item 12.</font></u><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</font> <u><font size="2">Security Ownership of Certain Beneficial Owners and
Management</font></u></b></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in">
<font size="2">Information
regarding security ownership of certain beneficial owners and management is
incorporated herein by reference to the information included in the Company's
definitive proxy statement which will be filed with the Commission within 120
days after the end of the Company's 2003 fiscal year.</font></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="line-height:150%;page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in"><b>
<u><font size="2">Item 13.</font></u><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</font> <u><font size="2">Certain Relationships and Related Transactions</font></u></b></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in">
<font size="2">Information
regarding certain relationships and related transactions is incorporated herein
by reference to the information included in the Company's definitive proxy
statement which will be filed with the Commission within 120 days after the end
of the Company's 2003 fiscal year.</font></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in"><b><u>
<font size="2">Item 14.</font></u></b><font size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</font>
<b><u><font size="2">Principal Accounting Fees and Services</font></u></b></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid; margin-left:0.5in">
<font size="2">Information
regarding principal accounting fees and services is incorporated herein by
reference to the information included in the Company's definitive proxy
statement which will be filed with the Commission within 120 days after the end
of the Company's 2003 fiscal year.</font></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" align="center" style="text-align:center;line-height:
150%;page-break-after:avoid"><b><u><font size="2">PART IV</font></u></b></p>

<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" align="center" style="text-align:center;page-break-after:

<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" align="center" style="text-align:center;page-break-after:

<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid"><font size="2">Pursuant to the
requirements of Section 13 or 15(d) of the Securities and Exchange Act of 1934,
the Registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the
undersigned, thereunto duly authorized.</font></p>
<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent" style="page-break-after:avoid">&nbsp;</p>

<p class="MsoBodyTextIndent2" align="left" style="text-align: left"><b>

    <p class="MsoTitle" align="left" style="text-align: left; margin-left: 5.05pt">
    Delaware</td>

<head>

<meta name="ProgId" content="FrontPage.Editor.Document">

<title>EXHIBIT 31</title>

<!--

<body>

<p class="MsoHeading8" style="margin-left: 6.0in">
<b>EXHIBIT 31.1</b></p>
<p class="MsoHeading8" align="center" style="text-align: center"><b>CERTIFICATIONS</b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoBlockText">I, Brian J. Lipke, certify that:</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 94.05pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
I have reviewed this annual report
on Form 10-K of Gibraltar Steel Corporation; <br>
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 94.05pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Based on my knowledge, this report
does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a
material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the
circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect
to the period covered by this report;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 94.05pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Based on my knowledge, the
financial statements, and other financial information included in this report,
fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of
operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods
presented in this report;<br>
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 94.05pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The registrant's other certifying
officers and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure
controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and
15d-15(e)) for the registrant and have:</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -30pt; margin-left: 135pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -30pt; margin-left: 135pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such
disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to
ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its
consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities,
particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -30pt; margin-left: 135pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -30pt; margin-left: 135pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant's disclosure controls and
procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness
of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered
by this report based on such evaluation; and,</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -30pt; margin-left: 135pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -30pt; margin-left: 135pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
disclosed in this report any change in the registrant's internal control
over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant's fourth fiscal
quarter that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially
affect, the registrant's internal control over financial reporting.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: .2in">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 94.05pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The registrant's other certifying
officers and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal
control over financial reporting, to the registrant's auditors and the audit
committee of the registrant's board of directors (or persons performing the
equivalent function):</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 137.25pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 137.25pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
all significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or
operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably
likely to adversely affect the registrant's ability to record, process,
summarize and report financial information; and<br>
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 137.25pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other
employees who have a significant role in the registrant's internal control over
financial reporting.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: .2in">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: .2in">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Date: February 25, 2004</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: .2in">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: .2in">
&nbsp;</p>
<table class="MsoNormalTable" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse: collapse; margin-left: 72.9pt">
  <tr>
    <td width="258" valign="top" style="width: 193.5pt; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
    <p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="360" valign="top" style="width: 3.75in; border-left: medium none; border-right: medium none; border-top: medium none; border-bottom: 1.0pt solid windowtext; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
    <p class="MsoNormal">/s/ Brian J. Lipke</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td width="258" valign="top" style="width: 193.5pt; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
    <p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="360" valign="top" style="width: 3.75in; border: medium none; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
    <p class="MsoNormal">Brian J. Lipke</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td width="258" valign="top" style="width: 193.5pt; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
    <p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="360" valign="top" style="width: 3.75in; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
    <p class="MsoNormal">Chief Executive Officer
    and Chairman of the Board </td>

<p class="MsoHeading8" style="margin-left:6.0in">
<b>EXHIBIT 31.2</b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
<b>CERTIFICATIONS</b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoBlockText">I, Henning Kornbrekke, certify that:</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; I have reviewed this annual report on
Form 10-K of Gibraltar Steel Corporation; </p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Based on my knowledge, this report
does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a
material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the
circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect
to the period covered by this report;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Based on my knowledge, the financial
statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly
present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations
and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this
report;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -31.5pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The registrant's other certifying
officers and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure
controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and
15d-15(e)) for the registrant and have:</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -31.5pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -.35in; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; designed such disclosure controls and
procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed
under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the
registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by
others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this
report is being prepared;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -.35in; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -.35in; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; evaluated the effectiveness of the
registrant's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our
conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures,
as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation;
and, </p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -22.5pt; margin-left: 121.5pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -22.5pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; disclosed in this report any change in the
registrant's internal control over financial reporting that &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;occurred during
the registrant's fourth fiscal quarter that has materially affected, or is
reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant's internal control over
financial reporting.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -22.5pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The registrant's other certifying
officers and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal
control over financial reporting, to the registrant's auditors and the audit
committee of the registrant's board of directors (or persons performing the
equivalent function):</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 135.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;all significant deficiencies and
material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over
financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the
registrant's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial
information; and</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 135.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 135.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;any fraud, whether or not material,
that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the
registrant's internal control over financial reporting.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: .2in">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Date: February 25, 2004</p>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-31.3
<SEQUENCE>6
<FILENAME>flintjex313.htm
<DESCRIPTION>SOXCERT
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>
<meta name="GENERATOR" content="Microsoft FrontPage 5.0">
<meta name="ProgId" content="FrontPage.Editor.Document">
<title>New Page 1</title>


</head>

<body>

<p class="MsoHeading8" style="margin-left:6.0in">
<b>EXHIBIT 31.3</b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: 3.5in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
<b>&nbsp;</b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: 3.5in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
<b>CERTIFICATIONS</b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: 3.5in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
<b>&nbsp;</b></p>
<p class="MsoBlockText">I, John E. Flint, certify that:</p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; I have reviewed this annual report on
Form 10-K of Gibraltar Steel Corporation; </p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Based on my knowledge, this report
does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a
material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the
circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect
to the period covered by this report;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Based on my knowledge, the financial
statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly
present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations
and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this
report;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -31.5pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The registrant's other certifying
officers and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure
controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and
15d-15(e)) for the registrant and have:</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -31.5pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.7pt; margin-left: 130.5pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; designed such disclosure controls and
procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed
under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the
registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by
others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this
report is being prepared;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.7pt; margin-left: 130.5pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.7pt; margin-left: 130.5pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; evaluated the effectiveness of the
registrant's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our
conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures,
as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation;
and, </p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.7pt; margin-left: 130.5pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.7pt; margin-left: 130.5pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
c).&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; disclosed in this report any change in
the registrant's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during
the registrant's fourth fiscal quarter that has materially affected, or is
reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant's internal control over
financial reporting.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.7pt; margin-left: 130.5pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -31.5pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The registrant's other certifying
officers and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal
control over financial reporting, to the registrant's auditors and the audit
committee of the registrant's board of directors (or persons performing the
equivalent function):</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -27.0pt; margin-left: 135.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -27.0pt; margin-left: 135.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;all significant deficiencies and material
weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial
reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant's
ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -27.0pt; margin-left: 135.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -22.5pt; margin-left: 130.5pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; any fraud, whether or not material, that
involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the
registrant's internal control over financial reporting.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: .2in">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Date:&nbsp; February 25, 2004</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: .2in">&nbsp;</p>
<table class="MsoNormalTable" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse: collapse; margin-left: 72.9pt">
  <tr>
    <td width="258" valign="top" style="width:193.5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt">
    <p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="360" valign="top" style="width: 3.75in; border-left: medium none; border-right: medium none; border-top: medium none; border-bottom: 1.0pt solid windowtext; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
    <p class="MsoNormal">/s/ John E. Flint</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td width="258" valign="top" style="width:193.5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt">
    <p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="360" valign="top" style="width: 3.75in; border: medium none; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
    <p class="MsoNormal">John E. Flint</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td width="258" valign="top" style="width:193.5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt">

    <p class="MsoNormal">Vice President and Chief
    Financial Officer</td>
  </tr>
